items.name: Maseru Star Explorers Dome
items.short_description: Journey through the cosmos with interactive shows and engaging presentations perfect for young stargazers. Discover constellations and planetary wonders.

items.name: Galaxy Kids Observatory
items.short_description: An introductory observatory experience where children can look through kid-friendly telescopes and learn about stars, moon phases, and space exploration.

items.name: Cosmic Quest VR Zone
items.short_description: Step into virtual reality and explore distant galaxies, walk on the moon, or fly through asteroid fields in this immersive space adventure for kids.

items.name: Little Astronauts Hub
items.short_description: A hands-on workshop center where aspiring astronauts can build rockets, simulate space missions, and engage in space-themed crafts.
items.address: 20 Ha Hoohlo Street, Maseru South, Maseru

items.name: Maseru Discovery Place
items.short_description: A vibrant museum offering hands-on exhibits across various themes, from local culture to global environments, designed for curious young minds.

items.name: Tiny Inventors Workshop Museum
items.short_description: Spark creativity and innovation with exhibits focused on science, technology, engineering, and math, encouraging children to build and experiment.

items.name: Cultural Kids Corner
items.short_description: Explore the rich heritage of Lesotho through interactive displays, traditional games, and storytelling sessions tailored for children.

items.name: Imagination Station Museum
items.short_description: A haven for young artists and dreamers, featuring art installations, craft zones, and imaginative play areas to foster artistic expression.

items.name: Curiosity Lab Maseru
items.short_description: Dive into the world of science with exciting hands-on experiments, live demonstrations, and exhibits that explain everyday phenomena.

items.name: Phenomenon Funhouse
items.short_description: Explore the wonders of physics, light, and sound through playful and engaging exhibits designed to make learning fun for all ages.

items.name: Bio-Adventure Zone
items.short_description: An engaging center focused on biology and the natural world, featuring exhibits on plants, animals, and the human body in an accessible way.

items.name: Tech & Tinker Hub
items.short_description: A modern science center dedicated to technology, robotics, and coding, offering workshops and interactive stations for future innovators.
items.address: 35 Ha Hoohlo Street, Maseru South, Maseru

items.name: Fairy Tale Forest Park
items.short_description: Wander through enchanting themed areas inspired by classic fairy tales, with hidden surprises and interactive elements at every turn.

items.name: Legends of Lesotho Garden
items.short_description: A unique park dedicated to Basotho folklore, featuring sculptures, performance areas, and guided storytelling of traditional Sesotho legends.

items.name: Imagination Grove
items.short_description: An open-ended play park designed to inspire children's own stories, with natural play structures, quiet reading nooks, and a small amphitheater.

items.name: Story Weaver's Green
items.short_description: A vibrant community space hosting regular storytelling events, puppet shows, and interactive workshops for children and families.

items.name: Adventure Character Plaza
items.short_description: Meet and greet your favorite adventure cartoon characters, get autographs, and capture memorable photos in a lively, themed plaza.

items.name: Mascot Kingdom Meetup
items.short_description: A joyful spot where popular mascots come to life, offering high-fives, hugs, and photo opportunities with their biggest little fans.

items.name: Toon Town Greetings
items.short_description: Step into a world of animated magic where beloved characters from famous cartoons await to share a moment and a smile with children.
items.address: Lancers Gap Shopping Centre, Moshoeshoe Road, Maseru

items.name: Fantasy Friends Forum
items.short_description: Encounter fantastical creatures and whimsical characters from storybooks and cartoons in a charming, interactive setting.

items.name: Junior Champs Arena
items.short_description: A multi-sport complex scaled for children, featuring mini pitches for soccer, basketball courts, and agile obstacle courses.
items.address: 70 Ha Hoohlo Street, Maseru South, Maseru

items.name: Little Kicks Stadium
items.short_description: A dedicated mini soccer stadium where young players can practice their skills, join friendly matches, and feel like real football stars.

items.name: Bounce & Score Hub
items.short_description: Featuring mini basketball and netball courts, this hub is perfect for kids to develop hand-eye coordination and enjoy fast-paced games.

items.name: Ninja Kidz Course
items.short_description: An exciting indoor/outdoor obstacle course designed for kids to test their strength, balance, and agility in a fun and challenging way.

items.name: Wonderland Maseru
items.short_description: A delightful theme park featuring gentle rides, whimsical attractions, and character appearances, perfect for a full day of family fun.

items.name: Adventure Island Park
items.short_description: Embark on an epic adventure at this pirate and explorer-themed park, complete with treasure hunts, water features, and interactive play zones.
items.address: 30 Adventure Bay, Roma Road, Maseru District

items.name: Fantasy Funfair Land
items.short_description: A magical funfair experience with classic carnival rides, enchanted carousels, and delightful games, bringing smiles to every child's face.

items.name: Safari Kids World
items.short_description: Go on a wild safari adventure without leaving Maseru! This park features animal-themed rides, a jungle gym, and immersive wildlife exhibits.

items.name: Maseru Wildlife Haven
items.short_description: A small, ethical zoo dedicated to local and regional wildlife, offering educational programs and close-up views of fascinating animals.

items.name: Gentle Paws Petting Farm
items.short_description: Children can interact with friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, and rabbits, offering a delightful hands-on experience for animal lovers.

items.name: Avian Wonders Sanctuary
items.short_description: Discover a vibrant collection of local and exotic birds in spacious aviaries, with daily feeding demonstrations and educational talks.

items.name: Reptile Rendezvous Park
items.short_description: A fascinating park dedicated to reptiles and amphibians, allowing children to safely observe snakes, lizards, and tortoises.
items.address: 85 Ha Hoohlo Street, Maseru South, Maseru

items.name: Dino-Land Maseru
items.short_description: Step back in time at this thrilling park featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, interactive dig sites, and educational exhibits on prehistoric life.
items.address: 15 Dino-Land Way, Roma Road, Maseru District

items.name: Jurassic Kids Adventure
items.short_description: A themed playground where children can explore giant dinosaur structures, dig for 'fossils,' and learn about different dino species.
items.address: 30 Fossil Ridge, Thaba-Bosiu Road, Maseru Rural

items.name: Prehistoric Pathways Park
items.short_description: Walk along paths adorned with impressive dinosaur replicas and informative displays, detailing the history of these magnificent creatures.

items.name: Fossil Fun Exploration Center
items.short_description: An indoor center offering interactive exhibits on dinosaur bones, fossil casting workshops, and virtual reality experiences with prehistoric beasts.

items.name: Carousel of Dreams
items.short_description: A classic, beautifully crafted carousel featuring various animal figures, providing a timeless and magical ride for young children.
items.address: Maseru Family Fun Park, Kingsway Road, Maseru

items.name: Mini Coaster Thrills
items.short_description: A pint-sized roller coaster offering gentle dips and turns, perfect for first-time thrill-seekers and younger adventurers.

items.name: Sky High Swings
items.short_description: Soar through the air on this delightful chair swing ride, offering panoramic views and a breezy experience for children and adults alike.

items.name: Bumper Cars Bash
items.short_description: Hop into a colorful bumper car and navigate the arena, bumping and dodging friends and family in a fun and safe environment.
items.address: Fun City Arcade, Ha Hoohlo Street, Maseru
